description: GCD of divisor-sum of primorials and primorials itself = GCD[A002110(n), A000203(A002110(n))].
comments: Values are repeated for several arguments: observed from 1 to 8 times below n=100. Sites of jump seems not so regular.From a sufficiently high value of n, A002110(n) divides the terms. E.g. from n=27, A002110(8) divides the values of this sequences.
author: _Labos Elemer_, May 15 2000
